mapper.select: SELECT A.id as typeID, A.name as typeName, A.generation_id, B.id as generationID, B.name as generationName FROM pokemon_v2_type A LEFT JOIN pokemon_v2_generation B ON A.generation_id = B.id WHERE A.id = #{id}

SELECT a.id, a.damage_factor, a.damage_type_id, a.target_type_id, b.id AS typeId, b.name AS typeName FROM pokemon_v2_typeefficacy a LEFT JOIN pokemon_v2_type b ON a.damage_type_id = b.id WHERE a.target_type_id = ${tid} AND damage_factor = 50;
